_sText:
ATTENTION:
The tactics where the only thing I looked a little bit up. The old map with very same tactics is called "de_pyramid_css".

This is my first officially made map. Unofficially I'd made over 5. The map "de_nightfever" inspirated me to make that one very professional, like High Dynamic Range and detailed mapping.
So, enjoy my map and have fun :D

THIS MAP ISN'T FINISHED

Map mission Information:

de_pyramid_v2
-------------
Destruction Complex

This old city is the best preserved of the aztec culture.

Counter-Terrorists:

Prevent the explosion of important monuments or destroy the Terrorists forces.

Terrorists:

Destroy the pieces of aztec monuments or eradicate the Counter-Terrorists.
